original_title: Court imposes travel ban on Diana Gamage
original_body_lines: Colombo, May 9 (Daily Mirror) - The Colombo Chief Magistrate’s Court today issued an order preventing State Minister Diana Gamage from leaving the country.
Colombo Chief Magistrate Thilina Gamage made this order in connection with a magisterial inquiry filed against her for allegedly committing offences under the Immigrants and Emigrants Act.
